title: Paupiette of sole with wild mushrooms and herb sauce
description: This elegant dish is perfect for a special supper.
ingredients: 200g/7oz salmon fillets, skinned and pin-boned, cut into pieces
½ unwaxed lemon, finely grated zest only
1 tbsp finely chopped fresh flatleaf parsley
50g/1¾oz wild mushrooms, preferably chanterelles, torn up if large
salt and freshly ground black pepper
